body.title: Project objective
body.text:
This project was completed in my first year at Epitech.

Given a map and its legend, the goal is to find the largest square without encountering any obstacles. In case of several squares of the same size, the algorithm selects the one that is the highest and then the one that is the furthest to the left.

body.title: Project constraint
body.text: A performant algorithm was necessary, as the program had a limited time to find the largest square. Optimizations were implemented to effectively locate the square on large maps with many obstacles.
